DOC.brief_summary: This research study test new investigational continuous glucose monitoring system ( System ) . The purpose study find performance System home use environment 15 day period , people diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Navigator II Continuous Glucose Monitor Home Use Study
DOC.criteria: The subject must : Have type 1 2 diabetes least 2 year prior enrollment . Require insulin therapy administer insulin pump multiple daily injection ( MDI ) least 6 month prior enrollment . Be least 18 year age . Be able read understand English . In investigator 's opinion , able follow instruction provide him/her study site perform study task specify protocol . Be available study visit . Be willing provide write sign date informed consent . The subject must : Be pregnant likely become pregnant study duration . Have skin abnormality insertion site . Have know allergy medical grade adhesive skin disinfectant . Be use continuous glucose monitor currently within past 6 month Have concomitant medical condition , opinion investigator , could interfere study present risk safety welfare subject . Be participate another clinical trial .
